definitions.definition: A person using long-range small arms for precise attacks from a concealed position.
examples: The sniper shot him in the head.

definitions.definition: Any attacker using a non-contact weapon against a specific target from a concealed position.
One who shoots from a concealed position.
One who criticizes; a person who frequently snipes at others.
A player who specializes in scoring goals .
examples: Alexander Ovechkin is often regarded as the greatest sniper of his generation.

definitions.definition: A person or automated process set up by a person who or which attempts to win an online auction by placing a bid only seconds before the auction ends, leaving no time for other bidders to respond

main_definition: A person using long-range small arms for precise attacks from a concealed position.
secondary_definitions: Any attacker using a non-contact weapon against a specific target from a concealed position.
One who shoots from a concealed position.
One who criticizes; a person who frequently snipes at others.
( ice hockey slang ) A player who specializes in scoring goals .
A person or automated process set up by a person who or which attempts to win an online auction by placing a bid only seconds before the auction ends, leaving no time for other bidders to respond
